statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={182.1}{e}^{{{0.0306}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0306}}\approx{1.0310729921928}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0310729921928}-{1}={0.031072992192807}\approx{0.0311} and the percent is 3.11.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
